alert.note: Alert for Salt River and Wyoming Ranges (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 24 at 2:31PM MDT until October 26 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM WEDNESDAY TO 6 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches for elevations above 8000 feet. Isolated areas with higher amounts are possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Salt River and Wyoming Ranges. * WHEN...From 6 PM Wednesday to 6 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult at times, especially over Salt River Pass. Heaviest snowfall is expected during the AM hours on Thursday. Patchy blowing snow could reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
